summary: Frosty on the outside, warm  on  the inside.  Located in the pine forest just south of Dawnstar, this sweet little chalet has everything a mage could want to craft their skills.  It features an indoor garden, alchemy and enchanting workbenches.  If you are looking for quiet seclusion, this is the home for you.
descriptionHtml:
Frosty on the outside, warm  on  the inside.  Located in the pine forest just south of Dawnstar, this sweet little chalet has everything a mage could want to craft their skills.  It features an indoor garden, alchemy and enchanting workbenches.  If you are looking for quiet seclusion, this is the home for you. 

There are two versions.  One requires DLC and one does not require any DLC (Skyrim version).  Thank you to ShadenzZz for helping me work out the bugs on the non-DLC version.

Follower friendly 

Can be a spouse home with the addition of Spouses Can Live Everywhere mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370).  Thank you to Amgepo and Emma who created this.  

Please remember to endorse if you like it.
author: Psylvermom
